loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo es un joven de 24 años de edad, soltero y sin hijos, actualmente esta viviendo en la casa de sus padres a quienes apoya económicamente, viven en un caserío urbano marginal de nombre Eureka perteneciente al Distrito de Lambayeque y a 15minutos de La Ciudad de Chiclayo. Es un aserio pequeño donde habitan aproximadamente 50 familias dedicadas a la agricultura en su mayoría.

Los padres de Eduardo le enseñaron a trabajar desde muy pequeño por lo que a la actualidad ah decidido dedicarse exclusivamente a dar el servicio de transporte de pasajeros de caserío en caserío, y a veces realiza carreras a larga distancia siendo contratado por clientes fijos quienes cada vez que necesitan de sus servicios se comunican vía teléfono. El vehiculo en el que trabaja es alquilado por un familiar de él, a quien le reporta un monto fijo todos los días, ha dicha actividad se viene dedicando ya 3 años por lo que Eduardo a ahorrado un 65% del valor de un vehiculo nuevo y ha decidido ver la posibilidad de comprarse una nuevo para generarse mayores ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de sus padres y la de él.
Eduardo cuenta con todo el apoyo de sus padres para que pueda trabajar independientemente.


Eduardo también se dedicaba a trabajar como jornalero cada vez que no lo hacia en su vehiculo y así pudo ahorrarse su dinero el cual quiere completar para la compra deseada, por lo que Eduardo ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1500 Nuevos Soles.
Cuanta con buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales, por ser un joven emprendedor.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a young man of 24.  He is single and doesn't have any children.  He is currently living in his parents' house and his parents support him financially.  They live in a poor urban village called Eureka which is located in Lambayeque district, 15 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  It is a small village which is home to approximately 50 families who mainly work in agriculture.

Eduardo's parents taught him to work from a very young age.  He has now decided to focus on offering a passenger transport service between villages, though he sometimes makes longer trips when he is hired by regular customers who ring him up when they need his services.  The vehicle which Eduardo uses for his work is hired from a family member to whom he gives a fixed sum every day.  Eduardo has been in this business for three years and has saved up 65% of the value of a new vehicle.  He has decided to buy a new vehicle so that he can make more income and thereby improve his parents' quality of life as well as his own.

Eduardo has his parents' complete support in working in his own business.  He used to work as a farm laborer whenever he wasn't working in his vehicle.  This meant that he was able to save up the sum of money he currently has.  He now wants to add to this money in order to make his purchase.  For this reason, he decided to request a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Eduardo has good personal and work references as he is an entrepreneurial young man.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is a conservative person thus she is unwilling to have her picture uploaded on the internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Muna is a 34-year-old married woman from Al Hussein, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Muna is looking to improve her family's living conditions thus she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase appliances and expand one of the rooms of the house.

loans.use: to purchase home appliances

loans.name: Magda

texts.es: Magda, de 64 años, es una mujer valiente que no dudo ningún momento en trabajar mucho por sus hijos cuando quedo viuda, lamentablemente perdió ta,bién un hijo, quien dejó huérfanos a tres niños a quienes ella cría como si fueran sus propios hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia en donde a diario les enseña buenas costumbres. Es así que todos los días desde muy temprano sale al mercado, va en busca de algunas prendas de vestir de segunda que compra por fardos y al por mayor, una vez que tiene sus productos agarra un vehiculo o un bote dependiendo del lugar a donde se diriga, para llegar a los pueblos, chacras o caseríos y ofrecer sus productos, asímismo intercambia con algunos animales que después trae a vender a la ciudad. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por 30 años, permitiéndole educar y criar a sus hijos. Le va bien su trabajo ya que es conciente que siempre se entrega al máximo para poder tener sus ingresos en el nivel que le permita tener ganancias para así cumplir con las obligaciones económicas del hogar. Le gustaría mas adelante tener una tienda de abarrotes en su casa ya que no le gusta mucho tener que viajar, porque le es muy pesado. Este será el crédito número 8 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará mas ropa usada y nueva.
texts.en:
64-year-old Magda is a courageous woman who never hesitated in working hard for her children when she was left a widow.  Sadly, she also lost one of her children who left behind three orphans.  Magda raises them as if they were her own children.  They live together in their own home where Magda teaches them good habits every day

Every day Magda goes out to the market very early in the morning.  She goes looking for used clothing which she buys by the bundle and wholesale.  Once she has her products, she catches a vehicle or a boat, depending on where she is headed, and travels to the towns, farms or villages to offer her products for sale.  She sometimes exchanges her products for animals which she then takes back to sell in the city.  She has been in this business for 30 years and it has allowed her to raise and educate her children.  Her work is going very well as she always works as hard as she is able so that she can make enough income to meet her household's financial obligations.  In the future, Magda would like to have a grocery store in her home as she doesn't really enjoy having to travel because it is very heavy going.

This will be Magda's eighth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can continue achieving her goals.  For her part, she pledges once again to make her repayments on time as she has done with her previous loans.  Magda will use the 800 soles that she has requested to buy more used and new clothing.

loans.use: to buy used and new clothing
